name: Zapdos

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

flavorText: A legendary bird Pokemon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

strengths: 90 HP Basic - highest HP Basic in Base Set
weaknesses: High energy costs (4 for both attacks)
counters: High HP Pokemon - Can survive Thunder/Thunderbolt

description: Zapdos is a Basic Lightning-type Legendary Pokemon with incredible stats. It has no weakness, Fighting resistance, and can deal up to 100 damage with Thunderbolt. Its 90 HP for a Basic is exceptional.
competitiveHistory: Zapdos was highly valued in competitive play for its incredible base stats. The combination of 90 HP, no weakness, and Fighting resistance made it one of the best defensive Basic Pokemon. It was used both as a main attacker and as a Haymaker counter.

rulings.ruling: Thunderbolt requires discarding ALL Energy attached to Zapdos, not just Lightning Energy.
Thunder's recoil damage is dealt regardless of whether the attack KOs the Defending Pokemon.
